nodes.text: An oasis on the edge of the Western Dune Sea of the planet Tatooine was a Force nexus strong with the light side of the Force. After the Battle of Yavin, the Jedi Nos'lyn led an aspiring Jedi to the oasis in order to instruct him in the ways of the Force.

The oasis was a location in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
